sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { number = Array(8).fill(0).map((x,i)=>i); cislo = [0]; checkboard = [false, false, false, false, false, false, false, false]; x = 0; checkbox(input: number): void { this.cislo = []; this.x = input; console.log(this.x) while (this.x > 0){ this.cislo.push(this.x % 2) this.x /= 2; } console.log(this.x) this.checkboard=[] for( let x = 0; x < this.cislo.length; x++){ if(this.cislo[x] == 0){ this.checkboard.push(false) }else{ this.checkboard.push(true) } } } } // for ( ;num > 0; ){ // binaryNum[i++] = num % 2; // num /= 2; // }
